short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Letting you know about UK businesses for sale and divestment news before anyone else

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Business Sale Report extension for Google Chrome notifies you about our breaking news stories on larger business divestments, firms falling into administration,  into liquidation and other distressed business opportunities - just as soon as they are published.

Choose from the following categories - you can select one, a few, or all of them to get the personalised update service you want. You can easily change your preferences anytime. 

News

    ☆ Business divestment news, also including news on companies in distress

Latest UK companies for sale, by category:

   ☆ Technology
   ☆ Manufacturing
   ☆ Engineering
   ☆ Leisure
   ☆ Services
   ☆ Food
   ☆ Professional & Financial
   ☆ Wholesale & Distribution
   ☆ Retail
   ☆ Advertising & Media
   ☆ Medical
   ☆ Building & Construction

Featuring:

- Alerts for new news articles and business for sale listings
- Customise your news and business for sale categories
- Regular updates
- Direct links to the articles or business for sale listings on our site at www.business-sale.com. 

This extension also enables you to quickly share links to the most interesting stories and businesses you find on Facebook, Google+ and Twitter.
